description: All agents have the same level of activity (15), which is unusual and may indicate a lack of diversity in task distribution or potential synchronization issues.
recommendation: Investigate the task allocation mechanism to ensure that tasks are being distributed according to the agents' capabilities and roles. Consider implementing a dynamic task allocation system to balance the workload.
